recommendations: Melanie Varghese “I had the pleasure of working with Chetan, and I am continually impressed by his exceptional talent in understanding the market and scouting top-tier talent for various roles. His ability to pinpoint the perfect candidates for specific positions is remarkable, demonstrating a keen insight into both industry trends and individual capabilities. What truly sets Chetan apart is his exemplary team spirit. He is a fantastic team player who always brings a positive attitude to the workplace. Chetan is an invaluable asset to any team, and I highly recommend him for any role that requires market understanding, talent scouting, and outstanding organizational skills. His contributions have been instrumental in our success, and I am confident he will continue to excel in any future endeavors.”

Javeed Khan ⭐️ (جافيد خان) “Chetan is not just a valued team member but also someone with whom I shared a unique bond. As the only other male team member, we developed a special connection. I often turned to Chetan to unload my thoughts, and his unwavering support was always there. His reassuring words, "you got this," meant more than I can express. Chetan's ability to adapt to changing and challenging situations has always impressed me. I've had the privilege of placing him in various roles, each with its own demands, and he has consistently emerged as a winner. One of the most notable transitions was when I moved Chetan from his core role as a Tech recruiter to Audit hiring, which is volume-based and seasonal. Despite the shift, Chetan excelled in this new arena, proving his versatility and dedication. Chetan holds a special place in my heart because I witnessed his remarkable journey firsthand. I remember when he joined us, somewhat raw but with an abundance of potential. The effort and determination he invested in refining his skills and readiness for any role have been a journey I've loved and cherished. Chetan, your growth and achievements have been truly inspiring. You have proven time and again that you can thrive in any challenge thrown your way.”
